sorcer.core.context

Class ContextManagementAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.context.ContextManagementAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, ContextManagement

    public class ContextManagementAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextManagement
    Context Management provides methods for managing contexts over the network. The ContextManagement interface is implemented by providers to allow for remote calls to obtain, update and delete contexts.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface sorcer.service.ContextManagement

        CONTEXT_FILENAME, CONTEXT_REQUEST_PATH

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContextManagementAdapter() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] currentContextList(java.lang.String interfaceName)
      Gets the list of methods of the defined interface which have contexts defined on in the context storage
      boolean deleteContext(java.lang.String interfaceName, java.lang.String methodName)
      Deletes a context from the data store, the data store is then updated so that future requests are handled properly.
      java.lang.Boolean deleteContext(java.lang.String providerName, java.lang.String serviceType, java.lang.String methodName)
      Delete the context from the provider specified for the interface and method
      Context getContext()
      Returns the default context by the defining provider.
      Context getContext(java.lang.String providerName, java.lang.String serviceType, java.lang.String methodName)
      Get the context from the provider specified for the interface and method requested
      java.lang.String getContextScript()
      Returns the default context script by the defining provider.
      Context getMethodContext(java.lang.String interfaceName, java.lang.String methodName)
      Obtains the context from data storage used to hold the contexts.
      java.lang.String getMethodContextScript(java.lang.String interfaceName, java.lang.String methodName)
      Returns the context script or its URL.
      java.lang.String[] getSavedContextList(java.lang.String providerName, java.lang.String serviceType)
      Get a list of the contexts currently stored on the provider.
      java.lang.Boolean saveContext(java.lang.String providerName, java.lang.String serviceType, java.lang.String methodName, Context theContext)
      Saves the context to the provider specified for the interface and method
      boolean saveMethodContext(java.lang.String interfaceName, java.lang.String methodName, Context theContext)
      Saves the context to the local data store and updates the file used for permanent storage

                                java.lang.String methodName)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: ContextManagement
        Obtains the context from data storage used to hold the contexts. Returns an empty context in the event the requested one is not found.

        getMethodContext in interface ContextManagement
        Parameters:
        interfaceName - String of the interface name the method is defined on
        methodName - Tag of the method the context is saved as
        Returns:
        Context representing the methodName
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
